hambanthota disthrikkaye janathawage waga katayuthu sandaha awashya jalaya laba dima sandaha shri lanka dakshina sanwardhana adhikariya warimarga wyapruthi 14k sandaha rupiyal laksha 31ka mudalak laba di atha.beliaththa, thangalla mulkirigala, thissamaharama yana mathiwarana kottasawala me warimarga wyapruthi kriyathmaka wemin pawathi.abalan wi athi waw amunu prathisanskaranaya kirima, paniya jalaya sapayima ala marga mangin jalaya gowibim wetha gena yama paniya jalaya sandaha lin harima, wani wari marga wyapruthi dan kriyathmaka wemin pawathi.beliaththe mahahilla beligahawela wawa aluthen idikara atha.
